register.description: This register enables the domain power state transition. It controls the HW supervised domain power state transition between ON-ACTIVE and ON-INACTIVE states. It also hold one status bit per clock input of the domain.

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the LVDSRX_96M_GFCLK clock input of the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the LVDSRX_L4_GICLK clock input of the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the VIP3_GCLK clock input of the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the CAL_GCLK clock input of the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the VIP1_GCLK clock input of the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: Controls the clock state transition of the CAM clock domain.

bitenum.description: NO_SLEEP: Sleep transition cannot be initiated. Wakeup transition may however occur.
SW_SLEEP: Start a software forced sleep transition on the domain.
SW_WKUP: Start a software forced wake-up transition on the domain.
HW_AUTO: Automatic transition is enabled. Sleep and wakeup transition are based upon hardware conditions.

register.description: This register controls the static domain depedencies from CAM domain towards 'target' domains. It is relevant only for domain having system initiator(s).

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards VPE clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards L4PER3 clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards GMAC clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards EVE4 clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards EVE3 clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards EVE2 clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards EVE1 clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards L4CFG clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards L3MAIN1 clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards EMIF clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards IVA clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

register.description: This register manages the VIP1 clocks.

bitfield.description: Selects functional clock for VIP between L3_ICLK and CORE_ISS_MAIN_CLK

bitenum.description: Selects L3_ICLK
Selects CORE_ISS_MAIN_CLK

bitfield.description: Module standby status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is functional (not in standby)
Module is in standby

bitfield.description: Module idle status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is fully functional, including OCP
Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion
Module is in Idle mode (only OCP part). It is functional if using separate functional clock
Module is disabled and cannot be accessed

bitfield.description: Control the way mandatory clocks are managed.

bitenum.description: Module is disabled by SW. Any OCP access to module results in an error, except if resulting from a module wakeup (asynchronous wakeup).

Module is managed automatically by HW according to clock domain transition. A clock domain sleep transition put module into idle. A wakeup domain transition put it back into function. If CLKTRCTRL=3, any OCP access to module is always granted. Module clocks may be gated according to the clock domain state.

register.description: This register manages the CAL clocks.

bitfield.description: Selects functional clock for CAL between L3_ICLK and CORE_ISS_MAIN_CLK

bitenum.description: Selects L3_ICLK
Selects CORE_ISS_MAIN_CLK

bitenum.description: Module is functional (not in standby)
Module is in standby

bitfield.description: Module idle status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is fully functional, including OCP
Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion
Module is in Idle mode (only OCP part). It is functional if using separate functional clock
Module is disabled and cannot be accessed

bitfield.description: Control the way mandatory clocks are managed.

bitenum.description: Module is disabled by SW. Any OCP access to module results in an error, except if resulting from a module wakeup (asynchronous wakeup).

Module is managed automatically by HW according to clock domain transition. A clock domain sleep transition put module into idle. A wakeup domain transition put it back into function. If CLKTRCTRL=3, any OCP access to module is always granted. Module clocks may be gated according to the clock domain state.

bitfield.description: Selects functional clock for VIP between L3_ICLK and CORE_ISS_MAIN_CLK

bitenum.description: Selects L3_ICLK

bitfield.description: Module standby status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is functional (not in standby)
Module is in standby

bitfield.description: Module idle status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is fully functional, including OCP
Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion
Module is in Idle mode (only OCP part). It is functional if using separate functional clock
Module is disabled and cannot be accessed

bitfield.description: Control the way mandatory clocks are managed.

bitenum.description: Module is disabled by SW. Any OCP access to module results in an error, except if resulting from a module wakeup (asynchronous wakeup).

Module is managed automatically by HW according to clock domain transition. A clock domain sleep transition put module into idle. A wakeup domain transition put it back into function. If CLKTRCTRL=3, any OCP access to module is always granted. Module clocks may be gated according to the clock domain state.

register.description: This register manages the LVDSRX clocks.

bitfield.description: Module idle status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is fully functional, including OCP
Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion
Module is in Idle mode (only OCP part). It is functional if using separate functional clock
Module is disabled and cannot be accessed

bitfield.description: Control the way mandatory clocks are managed.

bitenum.description: Module is disabled by SW. Any OCP access to module results in an error, except if resulting from a module wakeup (asynchronous wakeup).

Module is explicitly enabled. Interface clock (if not used for functions) may be gated according to the clock domain state. Functional clocks are guaranteed to stay present. As long as in this configuration, power domain sleep transition cannot happen.

bitfield.description: Module standby status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is functional (not in standby)
Module is in standby

bitfield.description: Module idle status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is fully functional, including OCP
Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion
Module is in Idle mode (only OCP part). It is functional if using separate functional clock

bitenum.description: Module is managed automatically by HW according to clock domain transition. A clock domain sleep transition put module into idle.
